name: Scrappy Research
description:
A nasty bunch of zombie scientists have invaded a farmer's farm and junkyard.

Zombies never come in small packages meaning a giant horde of zombie scientists are on their way.

Zombies aren't usually the brightest of creatures but zombie scientists are the smartest type of zombie around.

Zombie scientists are able to concoct harmful potions, teleport and even become invisible!

Armed with nothing but a rifle and unable to heal if attacked, this farmer's only option is to make a quick escape in his plane before the horde arrives, but it's out of fuel!

There's no way he can take a trip to get some so he'll have to make do and extract the blood from the zombie scientists currently calling his land home.

But killing many zombie scientists is going to take a lot of bullets. Luckily the farmer has plenty stored in pickup trucks located all over the farm and junkyard.

Will the farmer make a daring escape or will he be consumed by these Scrappy Researchers?
